data.title: The 100 Most Popular Televisa/TV Azteca Telenovelas
data.text:
A woman who is frowned upon for being the ugliest woman around, falls hopelessly in love with her boss, the heir of a film enterprise.

After many years of marriage with her unfaithful husband. A woman in her late 40s discover that she can find love with a younger man.

Six teenagers with different lives and personalities attend a prominent private school with only one thing in common: their vocation and passion for music.

The title which translates to "A family with luck" this Spanish television drama tells the story of a humble family taken in by a wealthy businesswoman after the head of the family saves her life.

An ambitious woman of humble background and stunning beauty is determined to change her poor situation, using her seductive skills on a millionaire doctor.

A mother's overbearing and unhealthy love for her only biological son will lead to the realization of a despicable plot that ends up ruining the lives of many individuals.

A telenovela that dramatizes the romances and rivalries between two brothers and two sisters in Mexico in the early 1900s.

Ten years after being betrayed and left for dead in a Moroccan jail, a lawyer returns to Buenos Aires seeking revenge on the family that crossed him.

In 19th-century Mexico, Dr. Fuentes inherits a fortune and searches for a wife. His choice is Matilde Penalver y Beristain, from an aristocratic family whose fortune has waned.

A woman spends 20 years in jail for murder. When she gets out, she finds out that the only way to recover her son and daughter is to prove that she is innocent of such a crime.

Teresa desperately seeks to escape poverty. Resentful of the miserable life that left her without her sister, she plans to use her beauty and intelligence as method to enter the luxurious world to which she so desperately wants to belong.

Teresa is a young woman dominated by her greed. Her parents have made great sacrifices to give her a good, decent life, but Teresa wants more, a lot more.

María Mercedes, a poor girl who sells lottery tickets, meets a rich man who hates his own family and sees in María Mercedes an opportunity to make their lives miserable.

Story of love between Marimar and Sergio. Sergio is from a wealthy family, and Marimar lives with her poor grandparents in a hut in front of the ocean.

A brave, poor young girl is welcomed into a rich family and develops a romance with their misogynist youngest son, driving a woman already in love with him to go to great lengths to destroy their relationship.

The story of three brothers who are looking for revenge but find love.

Alma and Andrés are kindred spirits, but fate has always found a way to separate them over the years. As adults they are determined to be together. However, tragedy surrounds them and separates them once again.
